channel.title: PkPoint Exchange / Points
channel.description:
I was just wondering if anyone is willing to help me via teamviewer?
The problem is that I've got a working pk point exchange system that I added, but it's got two flaws.
Flaw 1 -
At the bottom of the skill interface there's the text "PVP" which should show the amount of PVP points the player has, but the problem is after you kill someone it dosen't change from 0.
Flaw 2 -
I've also got a successfully working PVP Exchange shop which FULLY works with the pk points except when you value an item it's set to coins, not to pk points.
E.g "This item costs 30 coins"
Instead of
"This item costs 30 pk points"
Like I said before, I've got teamviewer if anyones willing to help,
much appreciated

item.title: PkPoint Exchange / Points
item.dc:creator: @IfearI IfearI
item.description:
@IfearI wrote:

[quote=“Sp3ke, post:8, topic:294682”]Oops yeah I forgot it’s deltabased so sM not sendMsg.

Anyway, this is the code I used to attempt to fix the currency problem yet it still values the item in coins. Do you see any problems?

if (MyShopID == 1) {
sM(GetItemName(removeID) + “: currently costs " + ShopValue + " PVP Points” + ShopAdd);
}
sM(GetItemName(removeID) + “: currently costs " + ShopValue + " coinz” + ShopAdd);
}[/quote]

I’m sorry Idk, but I’ve got this:

if (MyShopID == 8) { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" tokkul"+ShopAdd); } if (MyShopID == 19) { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" points"+ShopAdd); } else { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" coins"+ShopAdd); }

and that works fine for me…

Read full topic

Anyway, this is the code I used to attempt to fix the currency problem yet it still values the item in coins. Do you see any problems?

sM(GetItemName(removeID) + “: currently costs " + ShopValue + " PVP Points” + ShopAdd);
}
sM(GetItemName(removeID) + “: currently costs " + ShopValue + " coinz” + ShopAdd);
}

item.title: PkPoint Exchange / Points
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“Sp3ke, post:6, topic:294682”]New problem : -

Can anyone help me with this compiler error, I think I’ve fixed the coin problem

client.java:14532: cannot find symbol
symbol : method sendMsg(java.lang.String)
location: class client
sendMsg(GetItemName(removeID) + “: currently costs " + S
hopValue + " PVP Points” + ShopAdd);
^
client.java:14534: cannot find symbol
symbol : method sendMsg(java.lang.String)
location: class client
sendMsg(GetItemName(removeID) + “: currently costs " + S
hopValue + " coins” + ShopAdd);
^
2 errors
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

It can’t find the method for ‘sendMsg’.

Read full topic

item.title: PkPoint Exchange / Points
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“Sp3ke, post:4, topic:294682”][quote author=Anfernio link=topic=389745.msg2910561#msg2910561 date=1250061961]
Haro
if(ITUM > 9213492314921394){
sandMesagf(“N0ob diz coast 30 peekay points.”);
}
[/quote]

What’s the “Haro” part all about[/quote]

It’s chinese for “Hi”, and that was a joke code, it probably won’t work. >.>

Anyway, make it check the shop’s ID and return the value as PK points?
